00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviPointerList.h"
00029 #include <QObject>
00030 
00031 class KviChannelWindow;
00032 class KviQueryWindow;
00033 class KviQueryWindow;
00034 class KviMainWindow;
00035 class KviIrcConnection;
00036 class KviExternalServerDataParser;
00037 class KviAsynchronousConnectionData;
00038 class KviIrcDataStreamMonitor;
00039 class KviWindow;
00040 class QTimer;
00041 class KviConsoleWindow;
00042 class KviIrcNetwork;
00043 class KviIrcServer;
00044 /*
00045         KviIrcContext is the structure that groups the objects and resources
00046         usable for a single irc connection: a console, a set of channels and queries,
00047         and a KviIrcConnection object.
00048 
00049         The objects grouped here are mostly permanent across connections.
00050 
00051         Each irc context has its own unique numeric identifier. The identifiers start
00052         from 1 so 0 is an invalid irc context id (this is useful in the scripting engine).
00053 
00054         The irc context is created in the KviConsoleWindow constructor and destroyed
00055         in the KviConsoleWindow destructor. No other class can allocate KviIrcContext objects.
00056 */
00057 
00058 class KVIRC_API KviIrcContext : public QObject
00059 {
00060         friend class KviConsoleWindow;
00061         friend class KviChannelWindow;
00062         friend class KviQueryWindow;
00063         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00064         friend class KviIrcContextToolBar;
00065         Q_OBJECT
00066 protected:
00067         KviIrcContext(KviConsoleWindow * pConsole); // only KviConsoleWindow can create this
00068 public:
00069         ~KviIrcContext();
00070 public:
00071         enum State
00072         {
00073                 Idle,         // connection() == 0
00074                 Connecting,   // connection() != 0
00075                 LoggingIn,    // connection() != 0
00076                 Connected     // connection() != 0
00077         };
00078 protected:
00079         KviConsoleWindow                       * m_pConsole;             // shallow, never null
00080         KviIrcConnection                 * m_pConnection;
00081 
00082         unsigned int                       m_uId;                  // this irc context id
00083 
00084         State                              m_eState;               // this context state
00085 
00086         // helper pointers
00087         KviMainWindow                         * m_pFrame;               // the owning frame, shallow, never null
00088 
00089         // permanent links and list window
00090         KviExternalServerDataParser      * m_pLinksWindow;
00091         KviExternalServerDataParser      * m_pListWindow;
00092 
00093         KviAsynchronousConnectionData    * m_pAsynchronousConnectionData; // owned, may be null
00094         KviAsynchronousConnectionData    * m_pSavedAsynchronousConnectionData; // owned, may be null, this is used to reconnect to the last server in this context
00095 
00096         unsigned int                       m_uConnectAttemptCount;
00097         QTimer                           * m_pReconnectTimer;
00098 
00099         KviPointerList<KviIrcDataStreamMonitor> * m_pMonitorList; // owned, may be null
00100 
00101         // dead channels and queries
00102         KviPointerList<KviChannelWindow>           * m_pDeadChannels;
00103         KviPointerList<KviQueryWindow>             * m_pDeadQueries;
00104         // other context bound windows
00105         KviPointerList<KviWindow>            * m_pContextWindows;
00106 
00107         int                                m_iHeartbeatTimerId;
00108 public:
00109         inline unsigned int id(){ return m_uId; };
00110         // never null and always the same!
00111         inline KviConsoleWindow * console(){ return m_pConsole; };
00112         // never null and always the same
00113         inline KviMainWindow * frame(){ return m_pFrame; };
00114         // may be null and may change!
00115         inline KviIrcConnection * connection(){ return m_pConnection; };
00116         // state
00117         inline State state(){ return m_eState; };
00118         inline bool isConnected(){ return m_eState == Connected; };
00119         inline bool isLoggingIn(){ return m_eState == LoggingIn; };
00120         // dead channels and queries
00121         bool unregisterDeadChannel(KviChannelWindow * c);
00122         bool unregisterDeadQuery(KviQueryWindow * q);
00123         void registerDeadChannel(KviChannelWindow * c);
00124         void registerDeadQuery(KviQueryWindow * q);
00125         KviChannelWindow * findDeadChannel(const QString &name);
00126         KviQueryWindow * findDeadQuery(const QString &nick);
00127         KviQueryWindow * firstDeadQuery();
00128         KviChannelWindow * firstDeadChannel();
00129         // other windows bound to the context
00130         void closeAllContextWindows();
00131         void registerContextWindow(KviWindow * pWnd);
00132         bool unregisterContextWindow(KviWindow * pWnd);
00133 
00134         inline KviPointerList<KviIrcDataStreamMonitor> * monitorList(){ return m_pMonitorList; };
00135 
00136         // links window
00137         void createLinksWindow();
00138         inline void setLinksWindowPointer(KviExternalServerDataParser * l){ m_pLinksWindow = l; };
00139         inline KviExternalServerDataParser * linksWindow(){ return m_pLinksWindow; };
00140 
00141         // list window
00142         void createListWindow();
00143         inline void setListWindowPointer(KviExternalServerDataParser * l){ m_pListWindow = l; };
00144         inline KviExternalServerDataParser * listWindow(){ return m_pListWindow; };
00145 
00146         void setAsynchronousConnectionData(KviAsynchronousConnectionData * d);
00147         inline KviAsynchronousConnectionData * asynchronousConnectionData(){ return m_pAsynchronousConnectionData; };
00148         void destroyAsynchronousConnectionData();
00149         // used by KviConsoleWindow (for now) and KviUserParser
00150         void connectToCurrentServer();
00151 
00152         void beginAsynchronousConnect(unsigned int uDelayInMSecs);
00153 
00154         void registerDataStreamMonitor(KviIrcDataStreamMonitor * m);
00155         void unregisterDataStreamMonitor(KviIrcDataStreamMonitor *m);
00156 
00157         void terminateConnectionRequest(bool bForce,const QString &szQuitMessage = QString(),bool bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect = false);
00158 public slots:
00159         void closeAllDeadChannels();
00160         void closeAllDeadQueries();
00161 
00162 protected:
00163         // called by KviIrcContextToolBar: this will DIE in favor of connectOrDisconnect()
00164         void connectButtonClicked();
00165         // used by KviConsoleWindow (for now)
00166         void destroyConnection();
00167         // for KviConsoleWindow (for now) . later will be used only internally
00168         void setState(State eState);
00169         // called by KviIrcConnection
00170         void loginComplete();
00171         // our heartbeat timer event
00172         virtual void timerEvent(QTimerEvent *e);
00173 public:
00174         void connectOrDisconnect(){ connectButtonClicked(); };
00175 protected:
00176         //
00177         // KviIrcConnection interface
00178         //
00179         void connectionFailed(int iError);
00180         void connectionEstabilished();
00181         void connectionTerminated();
00182 signals:
00183         void stateChanged();
00184 protected slots:
00185         void asynchronousConnect();
00186 };
00187
